description: Episode of Series "This is the United Nations". Cinemagazine items: 1. Indian students perform for UN club - Members of the United Nations Secretariat regularly learn about the cultures of many nations. The songs and dances of India are presented and explained. 2. UN votes independence for Libya by 1952 - After centuries of living under conquerors, Libya was liberated by the Allies in 1943. United Nations voted in 1949 that Libya should become an independent and sovereign state by 1952. A UN Commission is helping Libya to work out her transition from colonial status to independence.
